title: Discuss amongst yourselves
author: VD
content_html:
As a thank-you to everyone who participated in the Great Amazon Experiment of 2007, and in response to a few recent requests, I have uploaded the PDF version of Rebel Moon to voxday.net and made it available for download from the sidebar. Yes, there is a veritable trove of Voxological fiction now available for free download here, no less than four published novels and one unpublished short story collection.

Please don’t hit it right away unless you’re one of those actually waiting to read it, as Digital Cowboy would probably appreciate it if we could avoid monopolizing his bandwidth.
content_text:
As a thank-you to everyone who participated in the Great Amazon Experiment of 2007, and in response to a few recent requests, I have uploaded the PDF version of Rebel Moon to voxday.net and made it available for download from the sidebar.  Yes, there is a veritable trove of Voxological fiction now available for free download here, no less than four published novels and one unpublished short story collection.
Please don’t hit it right away unless you’re one of those actually waiting to read it, as Digital Cowboy would probably appreciate it if we could avoid monopolizing his bandwidth.
